# JAN Project Plan & Roadmap

This document provides a high-level overview of the JAN (Jenova Agent Nexus) project's planning resources.

## Strategic Plan

The comprehensive long-term strategic plan, including vision, goals, and phased development, is maintained in:
*   **[JAN Comprehensive Project Plan (Generated by Jules, July 2024)](./jules-jan-plan.md)**

## Detailed Task Management

For a detailed breakdown of current, upcoming, and completed tasks, please refer to:
*   **[docs/tasklist.md](./tasklist.md)** - This file tracks specific actionable items.

## Historical Plans

Older planning documents, such as the initial refactor plan for the CodeSwarm component, are archived for historical reference.
*   **[CodeSwarm ADK Refactor Plan (May 2024)](./archive/codeswarm_adk_refactor_plan_may_2024.md)**

This document (`docs/plan.md`) will be kept concise, primarily pointing to the detailed strategic plan (`jules-jan-plan.md`) and the dynamic `tasklist.md`.
